name: INPlaybackQueueLocation
desc: Constants that describe the playback queue location for a media item.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: A response that indicates the system doesnâ€™t know where to place the media item.

items.name: case now
items.desc: A response that tells the system to play the item immediately, interrupting any currently playing media.

items.name: case next
items.desc: A response that tells the system to play the media item after the currently playing media item finishes.

items.name: case later
items.desc: A response that tells the system to add the media item to the end of the playback queue.
